participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and passionate about life, Amina finds joy in self-expression through dance and values her freedom.
participant_1.background: now i live in the united states. my aunt helped me escape when i was of. i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a. i like to dance.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Curious and knowledgeable, Oliver enjoys sharing stories and experiences with others, and finds tranquility in his garden.
participant_2.background: i am a museum tour guide. i'm partly deaf. i love to drink fancy tea. i have a big library at home. i grow roses in my garden.
